root.name: Freddi Fish 2: The Case of the Haunted School House
root.description: Freddi Fish 2: The Case of the Haunted School House is the second installment in the Freddi Fish series. In the game, you follow Freddi and Luther, when a ghost steals Luther's action figure. Freddi and Luther go looking for the ghost to get the toy back. Players will solve puzzles, problems, and have an adventure throughout the game.
